Articles.Content:
4 years ago Kerbinsidemod tried to bring more runways on KSP

Is there any chance to get a mod allowing to build runways or launchpad throughout Kerbin, not to build like you build a base by transferring or mining materials, but a mod allowing a player to  start with 5 or 10 runways or a mix between launchpads and runways that he could set throughout the planet?

I suppose you could develop a plugin which duplicates the old airstrip (or anything else) and places it around the world. A visual editor would probably be too complicated for KSP, but if someone could input co ordinates then it could work.

 

But there's also Kerbal Konstructs which can technically add more runways, but you cannot launch from them.
I am not developper, it’s just an idea i launched, if someone is able to build such a plugin....
If I recall correctly, Kerbal Konstructs have a toool for you to create new launch sites on Kerbin. But you'll need to fly and land near your desired location though.

On 22.3.2018 at 1:10 AM, gilflo said:

4 years ago Kerbinsidemod tried to bring more runways on KSP

Is there any chance to get a mod allowing to build runways or launchpad throughout Kerbin, not to build like you build a base by transferring or mining materials, but a mod allowing a player to  start with 5 or 10 runways or a mix between launchpads and runways that he could set throughout the planet?

Kerbin-side is still alive and kicking.

As well as Kerbin konstructs ( with that you can create your own bases). ( Kerbin side only provides a bunch of assets and pre-built bases).
Newer versions of GPP (with Kerbal Konstructs installed) have multiple launch sites, and upgrades the KSC with additional launch pads and a heavy runway.
